original_text: But my servant Caleb, because he has a different spirit and has followed me fully, I will bring into the land into which he went, and his descendants shall possess it.
korean_text: 그러나 내 종 갈렙은 그 마음이 그들과 달라서 나를 온전히 따랐은즉 그가 갔던 땅으로 내가 그를 인도하여 들이리니 그의 자손이 그 땅을 차지하리라

sentences.original_text: because he has a different spirit
I will bring into the land into which he went
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그를 그가 들어간 그 땅으로 들여보낼 것이요

sentences.original_text: and his descendants shall possess it
